headline: Analysts Maintain Buy Ratings on The Trade Desk (TTD) Amid Lower EV/EBITDA Multiples
summary: The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) ranks among the best innovative stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts. On February 3, KeyBanc cut its price target on The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) to $40 from $88 while maintaining an Overweight rating. The reduction reflects KeyBanc’s more conservative growth forecast and lowered EV/EBITDA multiples. Nonetheless, The […]
